field.label: Enable Failover
field.help: Automatically switch DNS to backup gateway when primary fails (detected by OPNsense dpinger)

field.label: Enable Failback
field.help: Automatically switch back to primary gateway when it becomes available again

field.label: Failback Delay (seconds)
field.help: Wait time before failback after primary gateway becomes available. Default: 60. Range: 0-600
